name: Herring Hunt
description:
This game is the product of a two-day-GameJam. We got our theme by using the random article function of wikipedia. These were the resulting articles:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herring_Hunt
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Huachuhuilca
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fiona_Culley

You climb the mountain of Huachuhuilca by using your fishing rod to pull yourself up. At the same time you will have to avoid enraged fish or try scoring some points by catching them. But be careful time is working against you.

Fair fishing fellow fisherman!

Controls:
Cast your fishing rod by holding down and releasing the left mouse button.

Credits:
